_comment: OPTION A (recommended): email + password — ARL is fetched and cached automatically
_subscription: Account must have Deezer HiFi / Premium for lossless FLAC downloads.

_comment: OPTION B: raw ARL token — grab from deezer.com browser cookies (lasts ~3 months)
_how_to_get: deezer.com → F12 → Application → Cookies → https://www.deezer.com → find 'arl' → copy Value
